collection.name: source_random_branch
collection.description: Chooses a random branch to send the user down (up to 8 branches). Good for randomly putting the user into a certain experimental condition.

variables.name: number_branches
variables.description: The number of branches to randomly choose between. Can be from 2 to 8. i.e. if you set it to 4 then it will choose a random number between 1 and 4 and then send the user down that branch.

variables.name: branch_chosen
variables.description: By default the branch will be chosen randomly. If you want to override that behaviour and set the branch using a variable from elsewhere then you can enter it here. It should be an integer between 1 and 8. If you want to keep the default random behaviour then set it to 0.

variables.name: .branch
variables.description: The branch chosen. Will be a character string like so: "branch_1" until "branch_8"

variables.name: branch_chosen
variables.description: An integer between 1 and 8 representing the branch chosen.

params.label: Number of branches
params.description: The number of branches to randomly choose between. Can be from 2 to 8. i.e. if you set it to 4 then it will choose a random number between 1 and 4 and then send the user down that branch.
params.name: number_branches
